caption.en: PLC controls pneumatic conveyor pressure; TIA Portal shows PID parameters, VFD frequency trend, and the stabilized pressure graph.
caption.id: PLC mengendalikan tekanan konveyor pneumatik; TIA Portal menampilkan parameter PID, tren frekuensi VFD, dan grafik tekanan yang distabilkan.

caption.en: The panel integrates PLC, VFD, pressure sensor, valves, limit switches, and a SwitchHub.
caption.id: Panel ini mengintegrasikan PLC, VFD, sensor tekanan, valve, limit switch, dan SwitchHub.

caption.en: Hardware configuration maps I/O and VFD parameters; wiring closes feedback and drive circuits.
caption.id: Konfigurasi hardware memetakan I/O dan parameter VFD; pengkabelan menutup rangkaian umpan balik dan penggerak.

caption.en: System architecture links PLC, sensors, and actuators to the VFD over PROFINET/PROFIDrive.
caption.id: Arsitektur sistem menghubungkan PLC, sensor, dan aktuator ke VFD melalui PROFINET/PROFIDrive.

caption.en: Control flow reads pressure, adjusts VFD frequency, and verifies limit-switch states.
caption.id: Alur kontrol membaca tekanan, menyesuaikan frekuensi VFD, dan memverifikasi status limit switch.

caption.en: Tuned PID holds pressure stable with quicker settling and minimal oscillation.
caption.id: PID yang dituning menstabilkan tekanan dengan waktu tunak lebih cepat dan osilasi minimal.

caption.en: Frequency trend reduces oscillations after optimization, delivering smoother fan operation.
caption.id: Tren frekuensi menurun osilasinya setelah optimasi, menghasilkan operasi kipas yang lebih mulus.

caption.en: HMI main screen built in Vijeo Designer displays the overall site layout, key sensors, and system status in real time.
caption.id: Tampilan utama HMI pada Vijeo Designer menampilkan layout keseluruhan site, sensor utama, dan status sistem secara real-time.

caption.en: HMI includes multiple functional pages—sensor monitoring, alarm overview, pump control, and alarm history—each providing real-time system feedback.
caption.id: HMI mencakup beberapa halaman fungsional—monitoring sensor, tampilan alarm, kontrol pompa, dan riwayat alarm—yang semuanya memberikan umpan balik sistem secara real-time.

caption.en: HMI main screen developed in EasyBuilder Pro displays the site overview with all gas detector nodes and real-time status indicators.
caption.id: Tampilan utama HMI yang dibuat dengan EasyBuilder Pro menampilkan overview lokasi dengan seluruh node detektor gas dan indikator status secara real-time.

caption.en: HMI features multiple pages—sensor monitoring, sensor setup, trending, and alarm history—allowing users to configure and track gas level changes accurately.
caption.id: HMI memiliki beberapa halaman—monitoring sensor, pengaturan sensor, trending, dan riwayat alarm—yang memungkinkan pengguna mengatur serta memantau perubahan kadar gas secara akurat.

caption.en: Main HMI screen on Weintek panel built with EasyBuilder Pro shows the site overview, detector node map, and live gas concentration indicators.
caption.id: Tampilan utama HMI pada panel Weintek yang dibuat dengan EasyBuilder Pro menampilkan overview lokasi, peta node detektor, serta indikator kadar gas secara langsung.

caption.en: HMI provides sensor monitoring, sensor setup, trending, and alarm history pages to ensure precise gas detection and system logging across the site.
caption.id: HMI menyediakan halaman monitoring sensor, pengaturan sensor, trending, dan riwayat alarm untuk memastikan deteksi gas yang presisi dan pencatatan sistem di seluruh area site.

caption.en: Performed wiring on EWS control panels, trial test on Weintek MTV using EasyBuilder Pro, and calibration of Honeywell XCD gas detector sensors during system integration.
caption.id: Melakukan wiring pada panel kontrol EWS, uji coba tampilan MTV Weintek menggunakan EasyBuilder Pro, serta kalibrasi sensor gas detector Honeywell XCD selama proses integrasi sistem.

caption.en: Developed PLC programs for the EWS system using Schneider Machine Expert Logic Builder and ZelioSoft 2 for smart relay configuration and alarm logic sequencing.
caption.id: Membuat program PLC untuk sistem EWS menggunakan Schneider Machine Expert Logic Builder dan ZelioSoft 2 untuk konfigurasi smart relay serta penyusunan logika alarm.

caption.en: Executed final wiring and system verification for EWS panels installed at Pertamina Patra Niaga site, ensuring all field sensors and alarms operated according to design.
caption.id: Melaksanakan wiring akhir dan verifikasi sistem untuk panel EWS yang terpasang di site Pertamina Patra Niaga, memastikan seluruh sensor lapangan dan alarm berfungsi sesuai rancangan.

caption.en: SCADA overview for the SWRO system designed in CIMON displays the entire reverse osmosis process, including intake, filtration, RO membrane, and product flow in real time.
caption.id: Tampilan overview SCADA sistem SWRO yang dirancang di CIMON menampilkan keseluruhan proses reverse osmosis mulai dari intake, filtrasi, membran RO, hingga aliran produk secara real-time.

caption.en: SCADA pages in CIMON include Backwash, Train 1&2, Manual Operation, and Alarm pages. Each interface visualizes process flow, manual control functions, and alarm monitoring to ensure continuous SWRO plant supervision.
caption.id: Tampilan SCADA di CIMON mencakup halaman Backwash, Train 1&2, Manual Operation, dan Alarm. Setiap antarmuka menampilkan alur proses, fungsi kontrol manual, serta pemantauan alarm untuk memastikan pengawasan plant SWRO berjalan terus-menerus.

caption.en: Main HMI screen developed in EasyBuilder Pro for the SWRO system displays the complete process overview including intake, RO membrane, and product tank monitoring.
caption.id: Tampilan utama HMI yang dibuat di EasyBuilder Pro untuk sistem SWRO menampilkan overview proses lengkap, meliputi intake, membran RO, dan pemantauan tangki produk.

caption.en: HMI pages in EasyBuilder Pro include Backwash, Train 1&2, Manual Operation, and Alarm pages. Each page allows operators to monitor and control the SWRO process directly from the Weintek panel.
caption.id: HMI di EasyBuilder Pro mencakup halaman Backwash, Train 1&2, Manual Operation, dan Alarm. Setiap halaman memungkinkan operator memantau dan mengendalikan proses SWRO langsung dari panel Weintek.

caption.en: Installed and wired power monitoring panels across multiple cubicles, ensuring correct phase alignment and communication between Schneider devices.
caption.id: Melakukan instalasi dan wiring panel power monitoring di setiap kubikel, memastikan kesesuaian fasa serta komunikasi antar perangkat Schneider.

caption.en: Prepared and crimped Ethernet RJ45 communication cables for network connection between power monitoring panels.
caption.id: Menyiapkan dan melakukan crimping kabel komunikasi Ethernet RJ45 untuk koneksi jaringan antar panel power monitoring.

caption.en: Tested network communication of power monitoring devices using laptop ping commands to verify data transmission stability across all panels.
caption.id: Melakukan pengujian komunikasi jaringan perangkat power monitoring menggunakan perintah ping pada laptop untuk memastikan stabilitas transmisi data di seluruh panel.

caption.en: Tested fiber optic (FO) cable links between different areas using optical power tools to confirm proper data transmission for monitoring systems.
caption.id: Melakukan pengujian koneksi kabel fiber optik (FO) antar area menggunakan alat pengukur optik untuk memastikan transmisi data sistem monitoring berjalan dengan baik.

caption.en: PLC regulates fan speed via VFD to hold the pressure setpoint after tuning.
caption.id: PLC mengatur kecepatan kipas via VFD untuk menjaga setpoint tekanan setelah tuning.

caption.en: Learning module based on the STM32F446 Nucleo-64 board, equipped with peripherals such as LCD, 7-segment display, keypad, relay, sensors, and communication modules (I²C, UART, PWM). The module is supported by a comprehensive manual book for basic microcontroller learning and peripheral interfacing.
caption.id: Modul pembelajaran berbasis board STM32F446 Nucleo-64, dilengkapi dengan periferal seperti LCD, 7-segment display, keypad, relay, sensor, serta modul komunikasi (I²C, UART, PWM). Modul ini didukung buku panduan lengkap untuk pembelajaran dasar mikrokontroler dan interfacing periferal.

caption.en: Hardware development includes layout planning, PCB design, system architecture, and complete schematic for the STM32F446 Nucleo-64 learning board. Each section defines component placement, electrical routing, and module connections such as LCD, keypad, sensors, and communication interfaces.
caption.id: Pengembangan hardware mencakup perencanaan layout, desain PCB, arsitektur sistem, serta skematik lengkap untuk board pembelajaran STM32F446 Nucleo-64. Setiap bagian menjelaskan penempatan komponen, jalur kelistrikan, dan koneksi modul seperti LCD, keypad, sensor, serta antarmuka komunikasi.

caption.en: ATmega-8535 microcontroller trainer kit designed for embedded system learning, complete with input–output modules, seven-segment displays, LCD, keypad, and communication interfaces. The kit is supported by a detailed guidebook that explains programming, circuit testing, and practical applications.
caption.id: Trainer kit mikrokontroler ATmega-8535 dirancang untuk pembelajaran sistem tertanam, dilengkapi dengan modul input–output, seven-segment display, LCD, keypad, serta antarmuka komunikasi. Kit ini didukung buku panduan lengkap yang menjelaskan pemrograman, pengujian rangkaian, dan penerapan praktis.

caption.en: Hardware development includes layout design, PCB routing, system architecture, and schematic diagrams for the ATmega-8535 trainer kit. Each part defines component arrangement, circuit flow, and connectivity between peripherals such as sensors, actuators, and communication ports.
caption.id: Pengembangan hardware mencakup desain layout, jalur PCB, arsitektur sistem, dan diagram skematik untuk trainer kit ATmega-8535. Setiap bagian menjelaskan penataan komponen, alur rangkaian, serta konektivitas antara periferal seperti sensor, aktuator, dan port komunikasi.
